name: Fly Like A Bee
description:
Help grow your garden and discover different varieties of flowers.

 

Fly between two different flowers, collecting all the coins between them to pollinate and grow a new plant. An orb will indicate which flower to fly towards.

Some flowers will start to wither away, their petals will brown and a decay icon will appear above them. Fly up to these plants to save them and keep your garden flourishing.

Beware of the predator bird! Hide in low bushes to avoid its attacks.

Controls

Movement - WASD

Camera Control - Mouse

Jump/ Flap Wings - Space Bar

Increase Speed - LEFT Shift
